koti thrasthawadaya parada samastha deshaya labagath wijayagrahanaya samarime uthsawaya mewara pawathwenne matharadi ya.wijayagrahana samarum pelapaliya mayi 18 wanida mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen perawaru 8 ta arambae.koti thrasthawadaya pawathi samaye rata wenuwen diwidun ranawiruwan sihipath kirima sandaha ranawiru samarum uthsawaya kotte parlimenthu sankirnayata yabadawa pihiti ranawiru smarakaya abiyasadi labana 19 wanida sanduda paswaru 4 janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen pawathweyi.aarakshaka amathyanshaye lekamwaraya da thriwidha hamudapathiwaru polispathiwaraya saha siwil aarakshaka hamudawe pradhaniya da athuluwa mathi amathiwaru ya.
